name: axios
text:
JUST IN: The Supreme Court has confirmed it will hear a Trump administration appeal to shield secret grand jury materials from the Mueller investigation from the Democratic-controlled House.

name: axios
text:
The move will likely extend the legal battle into next year, essentially guaranteeing that Democrats won't get them before the election. Democrats on the House Judiciary Committee sought to obtain the records as part of their impeachment inquiry last year.
https://t.co/xjoPLPPK9U

name: axios
text:

name: axios
text:
The U.S. has seen far more deaths from heart disease during the coronavirus pandemic when compared to historical averages, according to a Washington Post analysis.
